sentence: What do you think about benefits of the traditional medicine?
Why do you use traditional medicines ?
Which traditional medicine or herbs do you use for indigestion? what is the process of making such medicine and how do take it?
Tell us a situation from your own experience of using traditonal medicine?

How do you know when you have fever? How do you treat fever using traditional medicine?
How do you feel when you get cold and cough? How do you treat it using traditional medicine?
How do you cure wounds ? Do you prefer any traditional medicines to cure minor wounds ? if you use how do you prepapre those medicines ?
How do you care for your health to be healthy?
What traditional products do you use for hair care?
What are the natural products that you use for hair related problems(hair fall/dandruff/lice infection/grayng of hair)?
